name: liquid
description: A discord bot which allows organizations of all sizes to manage their expenses, right inside discord

scripts.start: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production TS_NODE_BASEURL=./out/bot node -r tsconfig-paths/register out/bot/main.js
scripts.dev:build: tsc && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development TS_NODE_BASEURL=./out/bot node -r tsconfig-paths/register out/bot/main.js
